statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, description FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND price < 50 ORDER BY id;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN categories ON products.id = categories.id;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE name LIKE '%electronic%';
SELECT id, name, price, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.id = categories.id WHERE categories.name = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products;
SELECT cat_name, cat_id FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM product_categories;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT description FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT p.name, c.cat_name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON pc.cat_id = c.cat_id WHERE p.price < 50 ORDER BY c.cat_name ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.cat_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.cat_id = c.cat_id WHERE c.cat_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, reviews.rating FROM products JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE price > 50

SELECT product_name, categories.category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS product_count, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products
SELECT products.product_name, reviews.review_text, reviews.rating FROM products LEFT JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name FROM categories WHERE name LIKE 'Electronics%';
SELECT * FROM product_categories LEFT JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id WHERE p.price < 100;
SELECT p.name, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM products p LEFT JOIN reviews r ON p.id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING average_rating > 3;
SELECT p.name, pi.image_url FROM products p JOIN product_images pi ON p.id = pi.product_id WHERE pi.id = 1;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(r.id) AS total_reviews FROM products p LEFT JOIN reviews r ON p.id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
